name: Back Home (Álvaro (Cresping))
description:
Description

Game developed only with cubes for a university project

It is recommended to play with headphones

Controls

Use the 'WASD' keys to move around

Use the mouse to rotate the camera

Use the 'E' key to interact with some objects

Press 'ESC' to exit the game

Credits

Ambient sound from REPULSIVE 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsRbuU_ffaJuxagEGpXfNkg

Various sound effects from

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCUZgG8CSGJDsbmKjDzKwOvg
